'''Java Edition 14w33a''' is the forty-sixth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], which was released on August 13, 2014.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140815000703/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-snapshot-14w33a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w33a|date=August 13, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Command format ===
'''[[NBT format]]'''
* <code>SelectedItem</code>
** Contains the item data of the item currently held in the player's hand.
** Added to compact the process of testing if a player is holding a specific item.
*** Previous method required nine commands in command blocks; now requires only one command.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Wooden door]]s'''
* Original wooden door was renamed to "Oak Door".
* [[File:Jungle Door JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Acacia Door JE2 BE1.png|32px]]<br>The models of jungle and acacia wood doors no longer have inner faces in the holes in their models.

'''[[Stone slab]]s'''
* No longer craftable from [[granite]], [[diorite]] or [[andesite]], or their polished variants.

=== Items ===
'''[[Wooden door]]s'''
*[[File:Spruce Door (item) JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Birch Door (item) JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Jungle Door (item) JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Acacia Door (item) JE2.png|32px]] [[File:Dark Oak Door (item) JE2.png|32px]]<br>The item textures of the new doors have been changed to match the dimensions of oak wood doors.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Iron golem]]s'''
* Now attack [[creeper]]s.
* Now gets attacked by [[skeleton]]s, [[zombie]]s, [[spider]]s, [[cave spider]]s, [[slime]]s and [[magma cube]]s.

'''[[Snow golem]]s'''
* Now attack creepers.

=== Command format ===
'''General'''
* Tab-completing coordinate arguments now fill in the coordinates of the block currently being looked at.

=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]es'''
* "This is good for [[realms]]." changed to "This is good for Realms."
